recipesJson.name: Peapompap (Peach Pomegranate Papaya)
recipesJson.author: Saramon
recipesJson.description: Peach and pomegranate go really well together, papaya and mango add a bit of depth to the flavors

reviews.text: I can't believe no one has reviewed this yet. My son and I both agree that this is one of our favorite recipes we've had. I always make a 240ml bottle of this. Great work!
